Merge branch 'captureonly' of github.com:matburt/mobileorg-android into captureonly

* 'captureonly' of github.com:matburt/mobileorg-android:
Implement the fire receiver, clean up the prefs editor for the plugin
fix malformed manifest
Use correct buttons on the sync plugin edit screen
Edits will now update all nodes with same :ID:.

Agenda items get their payload replaced by the original nodes payloads.

This works around that items payload in agendas.org is cut off
after a certain number of lines, as well as enabling proper editing of
those nodes' payload.
Externalized a bunch of strings.
Fix up some exception handling.  Clear the old notification when Sync fails and display a new one.  We should probably alert the user in a better way

Revert the ability to install the app to the sdcard.  Given that we can already store the application's data to the sdcard this seems unnecessary and prevents us from being able to act as a locale or tasker plugin
Import locale library and finalize implementation of the Locale/Tasker plugin

Merge branch 'locale-integration'

* locale-integration:
Import locale library and finalize implementation of the Locale/Tasker plugin
Revert the ability to install the app to the sdcard.  Given that we can already store the application's data to the sdcard this seems unnecessary and prevents us from being able to act as a locale or tasker plugin
Use correct buttons on the sync plugin edit screen
fix malformed manifest
Implement the fire receiver, clean up the prefs editor for the plugin
Initial Locale/Tasker implementation
